name: One Jump Man!
description:
You are One Jump Man, a superhero who can do only one thing: Jump!

Hold down the mouse to slowdown time and plan your jump

Point the mouse where you want to go

Release the mouse to go flying in that direction

You can jump three times before you have to recharge

Jumps recharge automatically while you're on a platform

Collect coins and defeat enemies to increase your score

Enemies can only be defeated by landing on their head

Reach the flag at the end to win!

Best played with a mouse.
